document.topic_text: Jesus will not be distracted with the Pharisees at this time. Jesus had a divine appointment with a woman at a well in Samaria. A wise person knows when to put off good things to accomplish great things. We should choose your battles carefully. Jesus was on a schedule. He put first things first. Sometimes you have to say no to good things to say yes to great things.Lets learn together how Jesus dealt with this woman. Sermons preached around the same date | more
